SmartCards.answer: Namma Metro Travel Card is the Contactless Smart Card used in Namma Metro for travel. If offers great discount and hassle-free travelling.

Recharge using Quick top up button available on Home section on webpage or by Recharge your card option available after logging in on BMRC.After successful recharge from the website, show the card on Automatic Gate at metro stations for top up. Now, the card is recharged successfully.
Namma Metro Travel Cards can be purchased online. There are four different types of smart cards, all with unique features.
